courses.description:
MPAIA-UE 1053 Intg Art Erly Chld Cur I 
Exploration of dramatic play in integrated early childhood classroom.

courses.course_name: Integrating The Arts Early Chldhd Curr II
courses.description:
MPAIA-UE 1054 Integrating The Arts Early Chldhd Curr II 
Materials and strategies for creating an integrated early childhood curriculum with a focus on infusing the curriculum with music and movement activities.

MPAIA-UE 1055 Integrated Arts in Childhood Education 
Methods for integrating music, art, dance, and drama into an integrated childhood education curriculum.
